/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with vehicles, including cars, trucks, and buses, all moving in different directions, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The buildings lining the street are predominantly gray and white, their neutral tones contrasting with the vibrant colors of the vehicles. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape.
